Enum Class Holiday

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Holiday>
model.Holiday
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Holiday>, Constable
public enum Holiday extends Enum<Holiday>
An ENUM for all Holidays through the year.

3.0
